content: these jack skellington ears are the perfect head accessory for this halloween halloween halloween yes you can sing it like in nightmare before christmas they also glow in the dark the ears are also easily detachable in fact you can can use the base as a foundation for other disney mouse ears this is a free jack skellington crochet pattern and video tutorial to help you create a fun and quick project for the spooky season you can also also use this pattern as an applique a garland or perhaps even a little pouch to hold some trick or treat candy treats don t forget to also make the companion oogie boogie ears 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ i d love to see how your project turns out tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 2 crochet along with me with the jack skellington tutorial 3 on my youtube channel and also see the glow in the dark action ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **level ** easy **need to know ** single_crochet in the round single_crochet in row half_double_crochet 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/oogie-boogie-ears 2 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 3 https //youtu be/eyaekmohnig
